Uses of Interface
net.jxta.endpoint.MessageTransport

Packages that use MessageTransport
net.jxta.endpoint Provides interfaces and classes used for the addressing, filtering, sending, and receiving of messages within JXTA. 
net.jxta.endpoint.router   
net.jxta.impl.endpoint A JXTA EndpointService implementation which implements the standard JXTA Endpoint Service. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.cbjx A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which which provides message verification by examining message signatures. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.mcast A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which uses raw IP multicast datagrams. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.netty   
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.relay A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which which provides client polling and server store-and forward functionality for peers incapable of receiving incoming connections. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.router A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which simply translates addresses in messages from peer ids to physical Endpoint Addresses. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.tcp A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which uses raw TCP/IP sockets. 
net.jxta.impl.endpoint.tls A JXTA MessageTransport implementation which which provides secure, private message transmission using TLS sockets. 
 

Uses of MessageTransport in net.jxta.endpoint
 

Subinterfaces of MessageTransport in net.jxta.endpoint
 interface MessagePropagater
          A MessagePropagater is a MessageTransport that can send propagated (multicast) messages.
 interface MessageReceiver
          A MessageReceiver is a MessageTransport that is capable of receiving messages.
 interface MessageSender
          A MessageSender is a MessageTransport that is able to send messages to remote peers using some protocol.
 

Methods in net.jxta.endpoint that return MessageTransport
 MessageTransport EndpointService.getMessageTransport(String name)
          Get a Message Transport by protocol name.
 

Methods in net.jxta.endpoint that return types with arguments of type MessageTransport
 Iterator<MessageTransport> EndpointService.getAllMessageTransports()
          Get an iterator of the MessageTransports available to this EndpointService.
 

Methods in net.jxta.endpoint with parameters of type MessageTransport
 MessengerEventListener EndpointService.addMessageTransport(MessageTransport transport)
          Adds the specified MessageTransport to this endpoint.
 boolean EndpointService.removeMessageTransport(MessageTransport transpt)
          Removes the given MessageTransport protocol from this endpoint service.
 

Uses of MessageTransport in net.jxta.endpoint.router
 

Subinterfaces of MessageTransport in net.jxta.endpoint.router
 interface EndpointRoutingTransport
          Objects implementing this interface fulfill the endpoint routing protocol duties as specified in the JXTA protocols.
